00114 class LIBVB4_EXPORT TColorValue : public TListValue
00115 {
00116 public:
00123     TColorValue (TValueBrowser *parent, const QString& name, TColorList *list = &TColorList::baseColorList(), int page = -1, int id = -1);
00129     TColorValue (TBaseItem *parent, const QString& name, TColorList *list = &TColorList::baseColorList(), int id = -1);
00130     // Destructor.
00131     virtual ~TColorValue();
00132 
00134     QColor          color() const       { return QColor(m_set.value.toString()); }
00135 
00137     void            writeValue(QColor &value)   
00138     { value = QColor(m_set.value.toString()); }
00139 
00140 
00141     virtual void    writeDataSet(QSettings &set);
00142 
00143 
00144     // Returns item's type name.
00145     virtual char*   ItemID() { return "TColorValue"; }
00146 
00147     virtual bool    autoIcon() const { return true; }
00148 
00149 
00150     // Set default init values.
00152     static void     setDefaultColorList(TColorList *list)   { s_colorList = list; }
00154     static void     setDefaultUseOwnValues(bool b)          { s_useOwnText = b; }
00156     static void     setDefaultAllowListAppending(bool b)    { s_allowListAppend = b; }
00158     static void     setDefaultExpandableItems(bool b)       { s_showExpandables = b; }
00159 
00160 
00161     // Standard button editor.
00162     static TColorButtonEditor s_ColorButtonEditor;
00163 
00164     // Standard combo editor.
00165     static TColorComboEditor s_ColorComboEditor;
00166 
00167 protected:  
00168     // Sets up item's visual appearance. Called internally.
00169     virtual void    setupValue(void);
00170 
00171     // Called internally to update editor geometry.
00172     //virtual void  updateEditorGeometry ( QWidget * editor, const QStyleOptionViewItem & option, const QModelIndex & index ) const;
00173 
00174     // Called internally to fill Item Editor when the item is selected.
00175     virtual void    fillEditor();
00176 
00177     // Called internally to append a value to the end of list; if the list is empty - creates it.
00178     virtual void    appendValue(const QVariant& val);
00179 
00180     // internal
00181     virtual const QIcon   itemIcon();
00182 
00183     // internal
00184     void    construct();
00185

00192 
00193     TIntegerValue *ivRed, *ivGreen, *ivBlue;
00194

00196     static TColorList* s_colorList;
